duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop a rapport with guests and maintain a friendly, courteous, and professional manner in all dealings.
Execute and facilitate service in cooperation with other IRD coordinators, IRD servers, cooks, chefs, stewards, and managers.
Ensure guests receive responsive, professional, and gracious service at all times.
Participate in pre-shift meetings for daily updates and continuous knowledge development.
Perform tasks and projects as delegated by the leadership team.
Understand the order taken by coordinator and any changes in the menu, dietary restrictions, food allergies, etc.
Take guest's order in the absence of a coordinator and plate & prepare small food items.
Deliver guestroom amenities and stock private bars.
Coordinate and execute boardroom events and BEOs.
